div.p:
1、存款前务必仔细核对存入账号和户名，以确保存入的资金顺利到账。
2、无卡存款交易只接受存入到本行卡账户，无折存款交易只接受存入到本行本地存折账户。
3、如果您接受上述条款并愿意承担使用本存款功能可能存在的风险，请选择[确认]，否则选择[取消]。

1.Before deposit,please check carefully the account number and the account name deposited in to ensure smooth transaction.
2.The deposit without card can only allow deposits to Card accounts of ABC,and the deposit without bankbook can only allow deposits to bankbook accounts of ABC in the same region.
3.If you accept the above terms and are willing to bear any potential risks of the deposit function,please select OK,or else select CANCEL.
请勿向陌生人汇款，谨防上当受骗
